effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

short_effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

flavor_text.sword_shield: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
